predictions.article: 10 Charts to Explain What's Shaping the Ag Economy at the Start of 2025
predictions.prediction: Due to a 345% surge in government payments, net farm income will increase significantly, leading to improved financial health indicators for U.S. farms in the short term.

predictions.article: AFBF: New Tariffs Will Impact America's Farmers
predictions.prediction: The new tariffs will lead to a decrease in U.S. agricultural exports by at least 10% within the next quarter due to retaliatory tariffs from China and other trading partners.
